definitions.definition: Upright; vertical or reaching broadly upwards.
(of body parts) Rigid, firm; standing out perpendicularly, especially as the result of stimulation.
definitions.example: The penis should be fully erect before commencing copulation.

definitions.definition: (of a man) Having an erect penis
definitions.example: OK, baby, I'm erect now. Let's get it on!

definitions.definition: Bold; confident; free from depression; undismayed.
Elevated, as the tips of wings, heads of serpents, etc.
To put up by the fitting together of materials or parts.
definitions.example: to erect a house or a fort

definitions.definition: To cause to stand up or out.
To raise and place in an upright or perpendicular position; to set upright; to raise.
definitions.example: to erect a pole, a flagstaff, a monument, etc.

definitions.definition: To lift up; to elevate; to exalt; to magnify.
To animate; to encourage; to cheer.
To cast or draw up (a figure of the heavens, horoscope etc.).
To set up as an assertion or consequence from premises, etc.
To set up or establish; to found; to form; to institute.
